strings.abyssea: string.format('Abyssea Lights | Amber: [%d] Azure: [%d] Ruby: [%d] Pearl: [%d] Ebon: [%d] Silver: [%d] Gold: [%d] | Time Remaining: %d ',abyssea.amber or 0,abyssea.azure or 0,abyssea.ruby or 0,abyssea.pearlescent or 0,abyssea.ebon or 0,abyssea.silvery or 0,abyssea.golden or 0,abyssea.time_remaining or 0)
strings.default: string.format('%s%s/%s%s | XP: %s/%s | LP: %s/%s [%s/%s] | CP: %s/%s [%s/%s] | EP: %s/%s [ML: %s/%s] | Sparks: %s/%s | Accolades: %s/%s', xp.job_abbr, xp.job_level or 0, xp.sub_job_abbr, xp.sub_job_level or 0, xp.current or 0, xp.tnl or 0, lp.current or 0, lp.tnm or 0, lp.number_of_merits or 0, lp.maximum_merits,cp.current or 0, cp.tnjp, cp.number_of_job_points or 0, cp.maximum_job_points, ep.current or 0, ep.tnml or 0, ep.master_level or 0, ep.master_level_max, sparks.current or 0, sparks.maximum,accolades.current or 0, accolades.maximum)
